titles.title: Susan B. Anthony Birthday Act
To honor Susan B. Anthony by celebrating her legacy on the third Monday in February.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

committee.subcommittee: Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia
committee.name: House Oversight and Government Reform

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: 3/3/2009--Introduced. Susan B. Anthony Birthday Act - Honors Susan B. Anthony by celebrating her legacy on the third Monday in February.
